create_account_text_description: Best Star To TON Exchange Bot
create_account_input: Insert the address of your TON wallet
exchange_ton_text_description:
TON will be sent to the address
you provided when you registered
exchange_ton_accordion_item_1: Due to too many transactions, the Star to Ton exchange has been temporarily suspended. We are already solving the problem. We will be back soon)
exchange_usdt_text_description:
USDT (TON) will be sent to the address
you provided when you registered
promotion_list_item_1: Subscribe or be subscribed to our Telegram channel.
promotion_list_item_2: Go to post with the giveaway and click the participate button
promotion_list_item_3: Click the “participate” button at the bottom of this page
settings_theme_text_hint: The default theme is light. Which you can change at any time.
settings_hint_text: By using the Mini App app StarFlow on Telegram, you automatically agree to the user agreement. Read more
share_list_item_1: Invite a friend and get up to 5% off each of their exchanges.
share_list_item_2: The more users you invite, the higher your %.
share_list_item_3: To invite a friend, simply send them your link.
share_list_item_4: You can read more about the referral system There..
rating_text: Ranking raises monthly limits and improves the rate!
rating_list_rating_hint: The overall rating affects your place on the leaderboard. Available rating affects your limits and rate. Read more
rating_list_limit_hint: Your limit is updated every month, to increase the limits you need to pump the rating. Read more
leaderboard_text:
Pump up your rankings and climb
the leaderboard
user_agreement_text_2:
Taking part in the referral system. You Automatically agree to the user agreement and privacy policy.
You also give permission to processing of your data.
footer_text_copy:
